title: Enhancing Instructional Design Practical Competencies: Understanding the Fossilization Process: Simulation-Based Advanced Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental geological concepts and biological decomposition processes
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Can explain the key stages of the fossilization process (biological, chemical, and physical changes) by categorizing them into three or more stages
Can predict the likelihood of fossil formation with over 80% accuracy by manipulating variables such as organic material type, burial conditions, and time in a simulation environment
Can comparatively analyze five or more environmental factors influencing the fossilization process and document the findings in a report format
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
